ComicInfo.Title: The Quick and the Dead!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Quick and the Dead!: Thor and the Asgardians storm the gates of Hel. Thor wrestles with Hela for the souls trapped in her realm, but before she is defeated, she disfigures the thunder god's face.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:14:30. [Issue ID 40678]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Mordonna (disguised as the Enchantress),Toothgnasher,Gudrun,Nanna,the Executioner,Rolfe],the Warriors Three [Fandral,Hela,Asgardian kids [Hildy,Modgud,Hogun,Frigga,Volstagg],Harokin,Balder,Garm,Sif,Toothgrinder,Thor
